Example 1Â¶

In the first example, we borrow a problem from Wikipedia.

where:
\[y(x) = 7x^3-8x^2-3x+3\]

Difference between the Wikipedia Example and this Example

The difference between Wikipedia example and this one is that the Wikipedia example uses Gauss-Legendre Quadrature while the code developed in this package uses Legendre-Pseudospectral Method with Lagrange-Gauss-Lobatto (LGL) nodes. Information on the difference between these methods and many more can be found in both [Shen2011] and [herber2015basic].

  • Conclusions
    • We are able to exactly determine the integral
